alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Henry; Mercer; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 6:17AM CDT until August 11 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Henderson County in west central Illinois... Northern Warren County in west central Illinois... Southeastern Mercer County in northwestern Illinois... Southern Henry County in northwestern Illinois... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 616 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Andover to near Bald Bluff, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monmouth, Cambridge, Galva, Burgess, Woodhull, Alpha, Andover, Little York, Seaton, North Henderson, New Windsor, Lake Warren, Alexis, Coldbrook, Bald Bluff, Berwick, Bishop Hill, Henry County Fairgrounds, Gerlaw and Ophiem. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
